meals.name: Pancakes
meals.description: Warm fluffy glutenous goodness served with warm tree blood

meals.name: Oatmeal
meals.description: Instant oats with peanut butter and chocolate chips.

meals.name: Fruit
meals.description: An assorment of any fruit that your child will eat.

meals.name: Peanut Butter crackers and apple
meals.description: Freshly ground peanuts sandwiched between two artisan whole wheat crackers. Organic apple picked from the tree on the way out the door.

meals.name: Mandarin oranges and Pretzels
meals.description: Fresh peeled mandarin oranges with artisan pretzels topped with salt from the sea

meals.name: Veggies and Hummus
meals.description: Hand ground chick peas mixed with spices served along side veggies that you picked from your meticulously curated garden.

meals.name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwhich
meals.description: Freshly ground peanuts and home pressed concord grape jelly sandwhiched between two pieces of freshly made whole wheat bread.

meals.name: Lunch box special
meals.description: Take their favorite lunch box and fill it with random things from your fridge. Carrots, cucumbers, grapes, cheese stick, lunch meat. If they don't like it then they can suck it.

meals.name: Grilled Cheese
meals.description: Lightly buttered and grilled artisan bread containing the finest of Wisconsin cheeses served with cheetos.

meals.name: Quesdadilla
meals.description: Freshly pressed tortilla pan fried in freshly churned butter with homemade mozzarella inside.

meals.name: Pizza
meals.description: A whole cheese pizza just for me.

meals.name: Fried Rice
meals.description: Day old rice fried in a pan with light soy sauce and mixed veggies. Add fortune cookie for authentic experience.
